criteria.title: Thesis & Argument
criteria.description: Clarity and strength of central argument
descriptions: Thesis is unclear or missing. No clear argument presented.
Thesis is present but weak or unclear. Argument needs development.
Clear thesis with adequate argument. Some supporting evidence.
Strong, clear thesis with well-developed argument and solid evidence.

criteria.title: Organization & Structure
criteria.description: Logical flow and structure of ideas
descriptions: No clear organization. Ideas are scattered and hard to follow.
Some organization present but transitions are weak or unclear.
Generally well-organized with clear introduction, body, and conclusion.
Excellent organization with smooth transitions and logical flow throughout.

criteria.title: Use of Evidence
criteria.description: Quality and integration of supporting evidence
descriptions: Little to no evidence provided. Sources not credible or relevant.
Some evidence provided but integration is weak or sources questionable.
Good use of relevant evidence from credible sources with proper integration.
Excellent use of compelling evidence from high-quality sources, expertly integrated.

criteria.title: Language & Style
descriptions: Frequent grammar and syntax errors interfere with meaning. Inappropriate style.
Some grammar/syntax errors present. Style needs improvement for audience.
Generally correct grammar and syntax. Appropriate style for academic writing.
Excellent grammar, syntax, and style. Writing is clear, engaging, and polished.

criteria.title: Content Knowledge
descriptions: Limited knowledge of topic. Content is inaccurate or incomplete.
Basic understanding shown. Some gaps in knowledge or minor inaccuracies.
Good understanding demonstrated. Content is accurate and complete.
Excellent mastery of topic. Content is thorough, accurate, and insightful.

criteria.title: Delivery & Speaking
descriptions: Difficult to hear or understand. Monotone delivery.
Generally audible but may be unclear at times. Limited variation in delivery.
Clear and audible throughout. Good pace and some vocal variety.
Excellent vocal delivery with appropriate pace, volume, and engaging variety.

criteria.title: Visual Aids
criteria.description: Effectiveness of slides, props, or other visual elements
descriptions: No visual aids or visuals detract from presentation.
Basic visual aids that somewhat support the presentation.
Good visual aids that enhance understanding and engagement.
Excellent visual aids that significantly enhance and clarify the presentation.

criteria.title: Audience Engagement
criteria.description: Interaction with and connection to audience
descriptions: Little to no eye contact or audience awareness. Reads from notes.
Occasional eye contact. Some awareness of audience but limited engagement.
Good eye contact and audience awareness. Engages audience effectively.
Excellent audience connection with confident eye contact and dynamic engagement.

criteria.title: Collaboration
descriptions: Rarely participates or contributes to group work.
Participates but may not always contribute meaningfully.
Actively participates and contributes valuable ideas and effort.

criteria.title: Individual Responsibility
criteria.description: Meeting deadlines and completing assigned tasks
descriptions: Frequently misses deadlines or fails to complete assigned tasks.
Usually meets deadlines and completes most assigned tasks.
Consistently meets all deadlines and completes all tasks thoroughly.

criteria.title: Communication
criteria.description: Sharing ideas and information effectively within the group
descriptions: Poor communication with group members. Ideas unclear or not shared.
Adequate communication. Usually shares ideas and listens to others.
Excellent communication. Clearly shares ideas and actively listens.
